response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional worth and benefits, I am confident it aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. For this remarkable opportunity, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a strategic advantage, allowing you to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or require additional information.", "product_price": 1200000}
